## Project Overview

This project focuses on developing and implementing standardized approaches for electronic health record (EHR) interoperability across multiple healthcare institutions in Portugal.

## Objectives

- Establish FHIR-based data exchange protocols
- Develop secure authentication mechanisms
- Create unified patient identity management
- Build clinical decision support integration

## Current Status

The project is currently in the pilot phase, with three healthcare centers participating in the initial implementation.

## Partners

- Faculty of Medicine, University of Porto
- São João University Hospital Center
- Portuguese Health IT Agency

## Funding

Supported by the Portuguese Foundation for Science and Technology (FCT).
